name: R√©ponse automatique aux avis du Google Play Store avec GPT-4o et analyse de sentiment
description:
# Ce workflow n8n automatise la r√©ponse aux avis du Google Play Store en utilisant l'IA. 

Il analyse le sentiment et le ton de chaque avis et publie une r√©ponse semblable √† celle d'un humain ‚Äî √©conomisant du temps pour les d√©veloppeurs ind√©pendants, les fondateurs et les chefs de projet g√©rant plusieurs applications.

---

## üí° Cas d'utilisation
- R√©pondre aux avis √† grande √©chelle sans para√Ætre robotique  
- Prioriser les retours de sentiment n√©gatif  
- Maintenir un ton coh√©rent et un message de soutien  
- Lib√©rer du temps pour que les √©quipes se concentrent sur le produit plut√¥t que sur les op√©rations

---

## üß† Comment √ßa fonctionne
- Utilise l'API du Play Store pour r√©cup√©rer de nouveaux avis d'applications
- Filtre les avis auxquels il a d√©j√† √©t√© r√©pondu
- Analyse le sentiment en utilisant OpenAI GPT-4o
- Transmet le sentiment et le contexte de l'avis √† un n≈ìud d'agent IA qui r√©dige une r√©ponse
- Les r√©ponses sont publi√©es sur le Play Store via l'API Google
- (Optionnel) Enregistre la r√©ponse sur Slack pour plus de visibilit√©

---

## ‚ö° Exigences
- Acc√®s √† la console d√©veloppeur Google Play  
- Projet Google Cloud avec compte de service  
- Compte OpenAI (GPT-4o ou mini)  
- (Optionnel) Espace de travail Slack et application pour l'enregistrement

---

## üôå Vous ne voulez pas configurer cela vous-m√™me ?
Je le ferai pour vous. Envoyez-moi simplement un e-mail : **imarunavadas@gmail.com**

Automatisons les t√¢ches ennuyeuses afin que vous puissiez vous concentrer sur la croissance. üöÄ

workflow.name: Auto-Reply to Google Play Store Reviews with GPT-4o & Sentiment Analysis by Arunava

values.content:
=You're an senior customer success assistant. Your task is to review customer reviews, and ratings along with the summary of analysis that has been provided you.

Check if the the sentiment analysis is accurate or it has missed some important factors and need/message of user. 

Please analyze the sentiment along with the review content and ratings provided below:
Sentiment summary: {{ $json.message.content }}
Review Content: {{ $json.reviews[0].comments[0].userComment.text }}
Ratings: {{ $json.reviews[0].comments[0].userComment.starRating }} out of 5 stars

Based on your understanding, reply a summary of sentiment analysis which covers everything that the user has mentioned along with user rating.

parameters.content:
## üõ†Ô∏è Setup Instructions for This Workflow

To make this Play Store AI review responder work for your app, you need to update the following nodes:

üîπ 1. HTTPS Node (Fetch Reviews from Google Play)
Replace the package name with your actual app's package.

Add Google Service Account credentials.
‚Üí Use Google Cloud to generate service account keys and give the account access to your Play Console (View app reviews permission).

üîπ 2. OpenAI Nodes
Add your OpenAI API credentials (chat model like gpt-4o or gpt-4o-mini). You can choose to switch models or temperature as needed.

üîπ 3. AI Agent Node
Update: Your app name, Core features, Custom reply logic (positive/negative/bug/etc.), Escalation contacts, Feel free to tweak or expand the prompt with new tone guidelines, emojis, or exam-specific logic.

üîπ 4. Slack Node (Optional)
If you want to receive a log of each AI-generated reply, configure this node: Create a Slack App > Get a bot token and invite it to your channel

Not required? ‚Üí Simply delete or disable this node.

## üôã‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è Want Me to Set It Up For You?
If you'd rather skip the hassle of configuring all this yourself ‚Äî
just reach out to me at üì© imarunavadas@gmail.com and I‚Äôll set it up for your app.

Let‚Äôs automate the boring stuff so you can focus on growth üöÄ

nodes.name: User Review Memory
nodes.notes:
{
  "brand": "App Name",
  "features": [
    "Feature 1",
    "Feature 2",
    "Feature 3",
    "Feature 4",
    "Feature 5",
  "tone_guidelines": {
    "voice": "friendly, helpful, and warm",
    "length_limit": "350 characters",
    "greeting": "Hi [UserName] üëã",
    "signature": "‚Äì Your Name, Company Name"
  },
  "escalation_contact": {
    "whatsapp": "+91 9999999999",
    "email": "help@youremail.in"
  },
  "review_reply_rules": [
    "Never overpromise on fixes.",
    "If 4-star review is extremely positive, thank and ask what can improve.",
    "Always acknowledge user concern or praise.",
    "Avoid repeating user‚Äôs words verbatim unless necessary.",
    "When confused, lean on support tone and contact sharing."
  ]

values.content:
=As a customer success assistant, your task is to conduct a thorough analysis of the provided user review and its associated rating. Begin by examining the sentiment expressed in the review, identifying whether it is positive, negative, or neutral. Pay close attention to any discrepancies that may arise between the numerical rating (out of 5 stars) and the qualitative content of the review.

In your summary note, please include the following key components:

Key Points: Highlight the main themes and messages conveyed in the review, noting any specific features or aspects of the product or service that the user has commented on.

User Experience: Describe the overall experience of the user as reflected in the review, including their satisfaction, frustrations, or any specific incidents that may have influenced their perspective.

Notable Quotes: Extract and present any particularly impactful or revealing quotes from the review that encapsulate the user's sentiment or highlight significant points.

Rating Alignment: Assess whether the given rating aligns with the overall sentiment and content of the review. Discuss any inconsistencies, such as a high rating paired with critical feedback or a low rating despite positive remarks.

Actionable Steps: If applicable, suggest potential actions or improvements that could be taken in response to the feedback provided in the review. This could include addressing specific issues raised, enhancing customer support, or implementing product improvements.

Please analyze the review content and ratings provided below:

Review Content: {{ $json.reviews[0].comments[0].userComment.text }}
Ratings: {{ $json.reviews[0].comments[0].userComment.starRating }} out of 5 stars

parameters.text:
=You are a friendly and thoughtful Customer Success Assistant for the {app short desription}, {app name}.

Your job is to craft short, personalized replies to Play Store reviews using the input below.

Constraints:
- Your reply must not exceed **350 characters**.
- Avoid sounding robotic or overly formal.
- Always address the user by their first name.

Input:
Reviewer Name: {{ $json.reviews[0].authorName }}
Star Rating: {{ $json.reviews[0].comments[0].userComment.starRating }} out of 5
Review Text: "{{ $json.reviews[0].comments[0].userComment.text }}"
Sentiment Summary: {{ $json.message.content }}

Reply Guidelines:
1. If the review is **positive** and **rating is 4 or 5**, express genuine appreciation.
   - Optionally mention a relevant feature like ‚ÄúFeature 1‚Äù, ‚ÄúFeature 2‚Äù, or ‚ÄúFeature 3‚Äù.
   - If it‚Äôs 4 stars with strong praise, thank them and gently ask what could improve to 5.

2. If the review contains **issues, bugs, or confusion**, apologize sincerely.
   - Offer help via Email: support@yourcompany.com

3. If the user mentions {keywords}:
   - Mention how {your app} helps for that {problem} (via feature 1, feature 2, or feature 3).

4. If the user's review sentiment is positive and has given 4 or 5 star rating:
   - Thank them and suggest exploring other features like ‚ÄúFeature 1, Feature 2, Feature 3, Feature 4, Feature 5‚Äù

5. Don't add line breaks, and try adding contextual emojis based on sentiment of the review.

Now craft a human-sounding, concise, emotionally intelligent reply:

user.name: Arunava

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
